name: ecommerce-redux
description: This is a online store built using MERN, GraphQL with Apollo server, MOngoDB, Nodejs/Express, REACT frontend. Redux is  used to store global state of the store. Stripe library is used tp test payments.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
